definition: easy as a hand's turn (idiom); very easy/no effort at all
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
as/as if/such as
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
palm of the hand/sole of the foot/paw/horseshoe/to slap/to hold in one's hand/to wield

sentences.english: Cut with razor knife and snap.
B. Don't think it's as easy as shooting a turkey.
sentences.chinese: 不要认为这是一件易如反掌的事情。

sentences.english: When you know the story behind an idiom it makes using it correctly a piece of cake.
sentences.chinese: 如果你知道成语后面的故事，用起来就会易如反掌。

sentences.english: Winning the game was a push-over.
sentences.chinese: 打赢那场比赛易如反掌。

sentences.english: With many years of academic training, pop songs are just piece of cake for her.
sentences.chinese: 许多年的学院派训练，演绎流行歌曲真是易如反掌。

sentences.english: Finding recipes in America is as easy as pie.
sentences.chinese: 在美国寻找食谱可谓易如反掌。

sentences.english: Nowadays, getting out of a committed relationship and getting into a new one is much easier.
sentences.chinese: 时下，抛弃老相好，投进新怀抱更是易如反掌。

definition: a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
easy/with no difficulty
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); very easy
as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease
pinyin: bu4 fei4 chui1 hui1 zhi1 li4

definition: harder than climbing to heaven (idiom)
lunatic ravings/nonsense/pipe dream
see 易如反掌[yi4 ru2 fan3 zhang3]
to feel in one's pocket and take sth (idiom); as easy as pie/in the bag
lit. even harder than reaching the sky (idiom)/fig. extremely difficult/far from an easy task
extremely difficult
to be carried away by one's wishful thinking (idiom)/to labor under a delusion/wishful thinking
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
see 易如反掌[yi4 ru2 fan3 zhang3]
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
as easy as reaching for it from a bag (idiom)/in the bag/(as good as) in one's possession
to be nothing difficult/to be a cinch
